name: Summer Roarmance - Demo v1.0
description:
You play as a college bound human who moves to Siren Falls, a mostly monster populated town, with your mom. You're going to live with her and her orc fiancee Fenton and attend college here after the summer.

Game comes with gender pronoun options (masculine, feminine, and neutral they) and custom name choice.

This demo release is my way of gauging interest in this project. If you're interested in this becoming a full game please let me know! Visit monsterhunk.com and e-mail, tweet, whatever at me and let me know what you think and if you want to see more of this! Any donations are highly appreciated.
